dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S455 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transport individuals to and from facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs in connection with rehabilitation, counseling, examination, treatment, and care, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself, Mr. Chambliss, Mr. Begich, and Mr. Moran) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to transport individuals to and from facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs in connection with rehabilitation, counseling, examination, treatment, and care, and for other purposes.

section.header: Transportation of individuals to and from facilities of Department of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Chapter 1 of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 111 the following new section:

section.header: Transportation of individuals to and from Department facilities

subsection.text: The Secretary may transport any person to or from a Department facility or other place in connection with vocational rehabilitation, counseling required by the Secretary pursuant to chapter 34 or 35 of this title, or for the purpose of examination, treatment, or care.
Subsection (h) of section 111 of such title is—

paragraph.text: transferred to section 111A of such title, as added by subsection (a);
inserted after subsection (a) of such section; and
amended by inserting Transportation by third-Parties.— before The Secretary.

subsection.text: The table of sections at the beginning of chapter 1 of such title is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 111 the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: 111A. Transportation of individuals to and from Department facilities.
